sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; const AdminDashboard = ({ onLogout }) => { const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Mock employee data - in real app, this would come from an API useEffect(() => { // Simulate loading data setTimeout(() => { setEmployees([ { id: 1, name: 'Jean Dupont', email: 'jean.dupont@company.com', phone: '+33 1 23 45 67 89', address: '123 Rue de la Paix, 75001 Paris', department: 'IT', position: 'Développeur Senior', status: 'active' }, { id: 2, name: 'Marie Martin', email: 'marie.martin@company.com', phone: '+33 1 23 45 67 90', address: '456 Avenue des Champs, 75008 Paris', department: 'Marketing', position: 'Chef de Projet', status: 'active' }, { id: 3, name: 'Pierre Durand', email: 'pierre.durand@company.com', phone: '+33 1 23 45 67 91', address: '789 Boulevard Saint-Germain, 75006 Paris', department: 'Ventes', position: 'Commercial', status: 'inactive' }, { id: 4, name: 'Sophie Bernard', email: 'sophie.bernard@company.com', phone: '+33 1 23 45 67 92', address: '321 Rue de Rivoli, 75004 Paris', department: 'RH', position: 'Responsable RH', status: 'active' }, { id: 5, name: 'Lucas Moreau', email: 'lucas.moreau@company.com', phone: '+33 1 23 45 67 93', address: '654 Place de la République, 75011 Paris', department: 'IT', position: 'Développeur Junior', status: 'inactive' }, { id: 6, name: 'Emma Petit', email: 'emma.petit@company.com', phone: '+33 1 23 45 67 94', address: '987 Rue de la Roquette, 75011 Paris', department: 'Finance', position: 'Comptable', status: 'active' } ]); setLoading(false); }, 1000); }, []); const handleExportCSV = () => { // Placeholder for CSV export functionality alert('Fonctionnalité d\'export CSV sera implémentée prochainement'); }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { return status === 'active' ? '#20b2aa' : '#dc3545'; }; const getStatusText = (status) => { return status === 'active' ? 'Actif' : 'Inactif'; }; if (loading) { return (

Chargement des employés...

); } return (

Tableau de Bord Administrateur

{employees.length}

Total Employés

{employees.filter(emp => emp.status === 'active').length}

Employés Actifs

{employees.filter(emp => emp.status === 'inactive').length}

Employés Inactifs

Liste des Employés

{employees.map(employee => (
{employee.name.split(' ').map(n => n[0]).join('')}

{employee.name}

{getStatusText(employee.status)}

Détails Personnels

Email: {employee.email}
Téléphone: {employee.phone}
Adresse: {employee.address}
Département: {employee.department}
Poste: {employee.position}
))}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
